title: Blackstone River Valley National Heritage Corridor: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                   Hopedale Bird's eye               Bobbins at Slater Mill               Bikeway at Pratt Dam               Slater and Wilkinson Mills               Detail of Slater Falls         Â    Looking to learn more about the Blackstone River Valley National Heritage Corridor? Explore these pages to see what we are all about.   History and Culture Discover the people and events that made the Blackstone River Valley a critical part of the growth of America.   What's A Corridor? A different kind of National Park Service unit.   Education We offer a number of lesson plans for use in your classroom.   Videos We have a number of videos you can watch on-line to explore the region.
